mapper.select: SELECT TRANS_MONTH, MATER_ID, MATER_NAME, PREV_INVENTORY, INPUT, OUTPUT, (PREV_INVENTORY + INPUT - OUTPUT) AS INVENTORY FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(MI.TRANS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS TRANS_MONTH, MI.MATER_ID, (SELECT MA.MATER_NAME FROM MATERIAL MA WHERE MI.MATER_ID = MA.MATER_ID) AS MATER_NAME, NVL(LAG(MI.INVENTORY, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY MI.MATER_ID ORDER BY MI.TRANS_DATE), 0) AS PREV_INVENTORY, NVL(MI.INPUT, 0) AS INPUT, NVL(MI.OUTPUT, 0) AS OUTPUT FROM MATER_INVENTORY MI) ORDER BY MATER_ID ASC, TRANS_MONTH ASC

SELECT TRANS_MONTH, PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PREV_INVENTORY, INPUT, OUTPUT, (PREV_INVENTORY + INPUT - OUTPUT) AS INVENTORY FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(PI.TRANS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS TRANS_MONTH, PI.PROD_ID, (SELECT PR.PROD_NAME FROM PRODUCT PR WHERE PI.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID) AS PROD_NAME, NVL(LAG(PI.INVENTORY, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY PI.PROD_ID ORDER BY PI.TRANS_DATE), 0) AS PREV_INVENTORY, NVL(PI.INPUT, 0) AS INPUT, NVL(PI.OUTPUT, 0) AS OUTPUT FROM PROD_INVENTORY PI) ORDER BY PROD_ID ASC, TRANS_MONTH ASC
